name: Dinosaur Island
description: Be any dino!  Roam the earth as a carnivore meat-eater, or as an herbivore plant-eater, or a flying Pteradactyl.  Sneak up on prey as T-Rex, Spinosaurus, Velociraptor, or Carnosaurus, or defend your herd against attack as Stegosaurus, Triceratops, and others.  Velociraptor hunts in packs so you coordinate with your friends to move around behind the herd.
